title: You won't let me make a post?
body: 505 error every time I try to post for weeks...

replies.body:
Every time you try to post here on the boards? It looks like might have been able to figure out what happened since you were able to make this post, but if you still have issues some times you could try [**clearing your browser history and cookies**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752694-Clearing-Browser-History-and-Cookies). 

Let me know if you're still getting that error sometimes or if clearing your cookies helps!
